#summary More notes on how to connect to mysql database

= JDBC Connector =
 * You will need to add a JDBC connector jar to your Build Path
 * I use /opt/gwt-linux/mysql-connector-java-5.0.8-bin.jar
 * You can see if its there in your Eclipse referenced libraries
 
 * Import the MySQL database query project link here - http://code.google.com/p/gwt-examples/wiki/Projects

 * Eclipse Project Source code - http://gwt-examples.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/gwt-test-MySQLConn/src/com/tribling/gwt/test/mysqlconn/server/

= Links =
 * JDBC Connector - http://www.mysql.com/products/connector/j/
 * MySQL Database The King James Bible; link to download sql dump script - db I used to test. http://sourceforge.net/project/showfiles.php?group_id=186532&package_id=249676&release_id=548680
